page.title: 01AIREDALE
page.content: The D block consists of a large amount of flat land. This is because it is in the valley bottom.Through the centre of the D block runs the River Aire and the Leeds to Liverpool Canal. Around Kildwick and Farnhill there is a lot of farmland which is used for cattle farming.The main shopping centre is Crosshills. This is convenient because it is in the middle of the other villages.The main road also runs in the middle of the D block following the river and canal.Most of the people who live in the D block are commuters,commuting to the cities.This is because most of the old industries have declined.In recent years the population of these villages has increased so more houses have had to be built.
